title: If Lee Sin is really Rito's favorite champ
body: Then how come he doesn't have an evolving skin like udyr and ezreal

replies.body: I think that relates more to how he's been OP for god knows how long now and they won't nerf him.  I'm pretty sure they love Udyr too since he's been deserving of some reigning in for a while now.
Because he's plain and boring, Thats why Lee took so long to be released.
Please, for the love of god, don't give people more reasons to play Lee Sin.

Well, Ezreal is an ADC, which Riot tends to favor along with #LCSPIGPLAYSPOSTERBOYLEESIN.

I dunno about Udyr, maybe because he was one of the first champions or something?

Udyr's was his visual rework.
Now they can wait longer to actually do one for his base skin.
If they did that he'd probably "evolve" more arms and legs when maxing q w e and r and get 3 charges on each of them like akali does on her ult cause "jungle diversity".
